comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: President William Howard Taft was a candidate for re-election in October, 1912. He lost his bid in a three-way race with the Progressive Party (Bull Moose) candidate, Theodore Roosevelt, and the Democrat Woodrow Wilson, who won election.
